# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #29](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#29)

#### Day 29

"Didn't you once lead a band of thieves out of this forest?"

Birgitte grimaced. "I was hoping you hadn't heard that one." (p. 236)
